atk-s0402a52:2_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame sukhapaṭikkhepena dukkhā paṭipajjitabbato paṭipadā etissāti dukkhāpaṭipadā.
atk-s0402a52:2_2: Asīghappavattitāya garubhāvena dandhā abhiññā etissāti dandhābhiññā.
atk-s0402a52:4_5: Paññindriyanti hi ettha vipassanāpaññāva paññindriyanti adhippetaṁ.
atk-s0402a52:5_0: Imāsaṁ pana paṭipadānaṁ ayaṁ āvibhāvakathā – idha bhikkhu pubbe akatābhiniveso pubbabhāge rūpapariggahe kilamati, arūpapariggahe kilamati, paccayapariggahe kilamati, tīsu addhāsu kilamati, maggāmagge kilamati.
atk-s0402a52:5_1: Evaṁ pañcasu ṭhānesu kilamanto vipassanaṁ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a52:5_2: Vipassanaṁ patvāpi udayabbayānupassane, bhaṅgānupassane, bhayatupaṭṭhāne, ādīnavānupassane, nibbidānupassane, muccitukamyatāñāṇe, saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇe, anulomañāṇe,
atk-s0402a52:5_3: gotrabhuñāṇeti imesu navasu vipassanāñāṇesupi kilamitvāva lokuttaramaggaṁ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a52:5_4: Tassa so lokuttaramaggo evaṁ dukkhena garubhāvena sacchikatattā dukkhapaṭipado dandhābhiñño nāma jāto.
atk-s0402a52:5_5: Yo pana pubbabhāge pañcasu ñāṇesu kilamanto aparabhāge navasu vipassanāñāṇesu akilamitvāva maggaṁ sacchikaroti,
atk-s0402a52:5_6: tassa so maggo evaṁ dukkhena agarubhāvena sacchikatattā dukkhapaṭipado khippābhiñño nāma jāto.
atk-s0402a52:6_0: Goṇapariyesakaupamāhi cetā vibhāvetabbā – ekassa hi purisassa cattāro goṇā palāyitvā aṭaviṁ paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0402a52:6_1: So sakaṇṭake sagahane vane te pariyesanto gahanamaggeneva kicchena kasirena gantvā gahanaṭṭhāneyeva nilīne goṇepi kicchena kasirena addasa.
atk-s0402a52:6_2: Eko kicchena gantvā abbhokāse ṭhite khippameva addasa.
atk-s0402a52:6_3: Aparo abbhokāsamaggena sukhena gantvā gahanaṭṭhāne nilīne kicchena kasirena addasa.
atk-s0402a52:6_4: Aparo abbhokāsamaggeneva sukhena gantvā abbhokāse ṭhiteyeva khippaṁ addasa.
atk-s0402a52:6_5: Tattha cattāro goṇā viya cattāro ariyamaggā daṭṭhabbā,
atk-s0402a52:6_7: gahanamaggena kicchena kasirena gamanaṁ viya pubbabhāge pañcasu ñāṇesu kilamato dukkhāpaṭipadā.
atk-s0402a52:6_8: Gahanaṭṭhāne nilīnānaṁ kiccheneva dassanaṁ viya aparabhāge navasu ñāṇesu kilamantassa ariyamaggānaṁ dassanaṁ.
atk-s0402a52:8_1: Tatiye asubhānupassī kāye viharatīti attano karajakāye ‘‘yathā etaṁ,
atk-s0402a52:8_2: tathā ida’’nti iminā nayena bahiddhā diṭṭhānaṁ dasannaṁ asubhānaṁ upasaṁharaṇavasena asubhānupassī viharati,
atk-s0402a52:8_3: attano kāyaṁ asubhato paṭikūlato ñāṇena passatīti attho.
atk-s0402a52:8_4: Āhāre paṭikūlasaññīti navannaṁ pāṭikulyānaṁ vasena kabaḷīkārāhāre paṭikūlasaññī.
atk-s0402a52:8_5: Sabbaloke anabhiratisaññīti sabbasmimpi tedhātuke lokasannivāse anabhiratāya ukkaṇṭhitasaññāya samannāgato.
atk-s0402a52:8_6: Sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassīti sabbepi tebhūmakasaṅkhāre aniccato anupassanto.
atk-s0402a52:8_8: Ajjhattaṁ sūpaṭṭhitā hotīti niyakajjhatte suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā hoti.
atk-s0402a52:8_12: ‘‘Asubhānupassī’’tiādīni pana dukkhāya paṭipadāya dassanatthaṁ vuttāni, paṭhamajjhānādīni sukhāya.
atk-s0402a52:8_14: tesu pana pakatiyāva sampiyāyamānaṁ cittaṁ allīyati.
atk-s0402a52:8_15: Tasmā tāni bhāvento dukkhapaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a52:8_17: tasmā tāni paṭipanno sukhapaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a52:9_0: Ayaṁ panettha sabbasādhāraṇā upamā – saṅgāmāvacarapuriso hi phalakakoṭṭhakaṁ katvā pañcāvudhāni sannayhitvā saṅgāmaṁ pavisati,
atk-s0402a52:9_1: so antarā vissamitukāmo phalakakoṭṭhakaṁ pavisitvā vissamati ceva pānabhojanādīni ca paṭisevati.
atk-s0402a52:9_2: Tato puna saṅgāmaṁ pavisitvā kammaṁ karoti.
atk-s0402a52:9_8: vissamitukāmassa phalakakoṭṭhakaṁ pavisitvā vissamanapānabhojanāni paṭisevanakālo viya vipassanāya kammaṁ karontassa cittuppādassa nirassādakkhaṇe pañca balāni nissāya cittaṁ sampahaṁsanakālo,
atk-s0402a52:9_9: vissamitvā khāditvā pivitvā ca puna saṅgāmassa pavisanakālo viya pañcahi balehi cittaṁ sampahaṁsetvā puna vipassanāya kammaṁ karontassa vivaṭṭetvā arahattaggahaṇakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a52:9_10: Imasmiṁ pana sutte balāni ceva indriyāni ca missakāneva kathitānīti.
atk-s0402a52:11_1: Catutthe akkhamāti anadhivāsikapaṭipadā. Khamāti adhivāsikapaṭipadā. Damāti indriyadamanapaṭipadā.
atk-s0402a52:13_1: Sattame mahāmoggallānattherassa heṭṭhimā tayo maggā sukhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā ahesuṁ,
atk-s0402a52:13_4: imaṁ me paṭipadaṁ āgamma anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimutta’’nti.
atk-s0402a52:15_1: Aṭṭhame dhammasenāpatittherassa heṭṭhimā tayo maggā sukhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā,
atk-s0402a52:15_4: Imesu pana dvīsupi suttesu missikāva paṭipadā kathitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a52:17_1: Navame paṭhamadutiyapuggalā sukkhavipassakā sasaṅkhārena sappayogena saṅkhāranimittaṁ upaṭṭhapenti.
atk-s0402a52:17_2: Tesu eko vipassanindriyānaṁ balavattā idheva kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyati,
atk-s0402a52:17_3: eko indriyānaṁ dubbalatāya idha asakkonto anantare attabhāve tadeva mūlakammaṭṭhānaṁ paṭilabhitvā sasaṅkhārena sappayogena saṅkhāranimittaṁ upaṭṭhapetvā kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyati, tatiyacatutthā samathayānikā.
atk-s0402a52:17_4: Tesaṁ eko asaṅkhārena appayogena indriyānaṁ balavattā idheva kilese khepeti,
atk-s0402a52:17_5: eko indriyānaṁ dubbalattā idha asakkonto anantare attabhāve tadeva mūlakammaṭṭhānaṁ paṭilabhitvā asaṅkhārena appayogena kilese khepetīti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a52:19_1: Dasame samathapubbaṅgamanti samathaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ purecārikaṁ katvā.
atk-s0402a52:19_3: Sotaṁ magganti ekacittakkhaṇikamaggassa āsevanādīni nāma natthi,
atk-s0402a52:19_4: dutiyamaggādayo pana uppādento tameva āsevati bhāveti bahulīkarotīti vuccati.
atk-s0402a52:19_5: Vipassanāpubbaṅgamanti vipassanaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ purecārikaṁ katvā samathaṁ bhāveti,
atk-s0402a52:19_6: pakatiyā vipassanālābhī vipassanāya ṭhatvā samādhiṁ uppādetīti attho.
atk-s0402a52:20_1: Tattha teneva cittena samāpattiṁ samāpajjitvā teneva saṅkhāre sammasituṁ na sakkā.
atk-s0402a52:20_2: Ayaṁ pana yāvatā samāpattiyo samāpajjati, tāvatā saṅkhāre sammasati. Yāvatā saṅkhāre sammasati,
atk-s0402a52:20_3: tāvatā samāpattiyo samāpajjati. Kathaṁ? Paṭhamajjhānaṁ samāpajjati,
atk-s0402a52:21_0: Dhammuddhaccaviggahitanti samathavipassanādhammesu dasavipassanupakkilesasaṅkhātena uddhaccena viggahitaṁ, suggahitanti attho. So, āvuso,
atk-s0402a52:21_1: samayoti iminā sattannaṁ sappāyānaṁ paṭilābhakālo kathito.
atk-s0402a52:21_2: Yaṁ taṁ cittanti yasmiṁ samaye taṁ vipassanāvīthiṁ okkamitvā pavattaṁ cittaṁ.
atk-s0402a52:21_3: Ajjhattamevasantiṭṭhatīti vipassanāvīthiṁ paccottharitvā tasmiṁyeva gocarajjhattasaṅkhāte ārammaṇe santiṭṭhati.
atk-s0402a52:21_4: Sannisīdatīti ārammaṇavasena sammā nisīdati. Ekodi hotīti ekaggaṁ hoti.
atk-s0402a52:21_5: Samādhiyatīti sammā ādhiyati suṭṭhapitaṁ hoti. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
